description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Descend to the depths of the lost city, survive hordes of creatures from the abyss and face the evil within its walls. Features: Dynamic level generation and adaptive AI director for maximum replay, unpredictable addictive gameplay, local coop, 4 difficulty levels. Collect idols to upgrade your sub and finish the story to unlock caverns of madness. Different experience every time you play!
